name: vault-commander
title: Vault Commander
description: Speed layer for Obsidian vault - capture, search, and daily note workflows
author: shanebarringer

commands.name: capture
commands.title: Vault Capture
commands.subtitle: Quick capture to inbox
commands.description: Quick capture thoughts to atomic inbox notes with backlinks to daily note

commands.name: today
commands.title: Vault Today
commands.subtitle: Open daily note
commands.description: Open or create today's daily note in Obsidian

commands.name: add
commands.title: Vault Add
commands.subtitle: Add to daily note
commands.description: Append text to a specific section of today's daily note

commands.name: search
commands.title: Vault Search
commands.subtitle: Search vault
commands.description: Fuzzy search across entire Obsidian vault

commands.name: ask
commands.title: Vault Ask
commands.subtitle: Ask Claude about your vault
commands.description: Query your vault using Claude AI - ask questions about your notes

commands.name: summarize
commands.title: Vault Summarize
commands.subtitle: Summarize notes with AI
commands.description: Use Claude to summarize selected notes or search results

commands.name: reflect
commands.title: Vault Reflect
commands.subtitle: Stoic reflection prompts
commands.description: Generate thoughtful Stoic reflection prompts based on your vault content

commands.name: task
commands.title: Vault Task
commands.subtitle: Quick task creation
commands.description: Create a new task in Todoist with natural language due dates

commands.name: tasks
commands.title: Vault Tasks
commands.subtitle: Today's tasks
commands.description: View and manage today's tasks from Todoist

commands.name: inbox
commands.title: Vault Inbox
commands.subtitle: Todoist inbox triage
commands.description: Review and organize tasks in your Todoist inbox

commands.name: voice
commands.title: Vault Voice
commands.subtitle: Import voice notes
commands.description: Import voice transcriptions from Superwhisper to vault inbox

preferences.name: claudeApiKey
preferences.title: Claude API Key
preferences.description: Anthropic API key for AI features (ask, summarize, reflect commands)

preferences.name: todoistApiKey
preferences.title: Todoist API Key
preferences.description: Todoist API key for task management features (task, tasks, inbox commands)

preferences.name: voicePath
preferences.title: Voice Transcription Path
preferences.description: Folder where Superwhisper saves voice transcriptions

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
